languages.text: "Да! Очень хорошие ботинки! И ведь в том, что мы их взяли, нет ничего дурного? А амулет... это по дурости кто-то прихватил. Нам не надо тут никаких амулетов. Мы все почитаем {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, а когда работаем, то кланяемся {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духам{/g} Большого и Малого трансформатора и Сервопривода — так еще сто лет назад один забредший техножрец моего деда научил! Поверьте, Ваша Светлость — мы праведные люди".

traits.locale_text: "Да! Очень хорошие ботинки! И ведь в том, что мы их взяли нет, ничего дурного? А амулет... это по дурости кто-то прихватил. Нам не надо тут никаких амулетов. Мы все почитаем {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, а когда работаем, то кланяемся {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духам{/g} Большого и Малого трансформатора и Сервопривода — так еще сто лет назад один забредший техножрец моего деда научил! Поверьте, ваша милость — мы праведные люди".
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."
languages.original_text: "Да! Очень хорошие ботинки! И ведь в том, что мы их взяли, нет ничего дурного? А амулет... это по дурости кто-то прихватил. Нам не надо тут никаких амулетов. Мы все почитаем {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g}, а когда работаем, то кланяемся {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духам{/g} Большого и Малого трансформатора и Сервопривода — так еще сто лет назад один забредший техножрец моего деда научил! Поверьте, Ваша Светлость — мы праведные люди".

We all worship the Emperor, and when we're working we bow down before the machine spirits of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servomotor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a tech-priest who came calling! Believe us, Your Grace — we are people of faith."

languages.text: “可不是嘛！那些靴子真的很漂亮！把它们拿走也没什么大不了的，是吧？至于那个护身符……肯定是被啥也不懂的人顺走了。这个地方根本不需要什么护身符，我们所有人都崇拜{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}。当我们工作的时候，我们会对着大大小小的变压器和伺服电机的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}鞠躬。一百年前，有位技术神甫到了我们这里，他当时就是这么教导我的祖父的。请相信我们吧，大人，我们都是虔诚的工人。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛！那些靴子真的很漂亮！把它们拿走也没什么大不了的，是吧？至于那个护身符……肯定是被啥也不懂的人顺走了。这个地方根本不需要什么护身符，我们所有人都崇拜{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}。当我们工作的时候，我们会对着大大小小的变压器和伺服电机的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}鞠躬。一百年前，有位技术祭司到了我们这里，他当时就是这么教导我的祖父的。请相信我们吧，大人，我们都是虔诚的工人。”
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: «¡Ah, sí! ¡Eran unas botas de muchísima calidad! Y no pasa nada por llevárselas, ¿no? Respecto al amuleto... debió de quedárselo alguien que no sabía lo que hacía. Aquí no necesitamos ningún amuleto. Todos adoramos al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, y, cuando trabajamos, nos inclinamos ante los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de los transformadores mayores y menores y del servomotor, ¡tal y como le enseñó a mi abuelo un tecnosacerdote que bajó hasta aquí hace cien años! Créanos, mi{mf|lord|lady}: somos gente de fe».
languages.original_text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah, sí! ¡Eran unas botas de muchísima calidad! Y no pasa nada por llevárselas, ¿no? Respecto al amuleto... debió de quedárselo alguien que no sabía lo que hacía. Aquí no necesitamos ningún amuleto. Todos adoramos al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}, y, cuando trabajamos, nos inclinamos ante los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de los transformadores mayores y menores y del servomotor, ¡tal y como le enseñó a mi abuelo un tecnosacerdote que bajó hasta aquí hace cien años! Créanos, mi{mf|lord|lady}: somos gente de fe».
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: 「あ、ああ、そうだね！あのブーツは本当に立派なものだった！それに、持っていっても特に害はなかっただろう？お守りは…きっと何も知らない人がポケットに入れたんだろう。ここらじゃ、お守りなんて必要ないからさ。俺達はみんな、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を崇拝し、仕事中は大小の変圧器やサーボモーターの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}に頭を下げているんだ！爺さんが、100年前に技術司祭から教えられたのと同じやり方でね！信じてください、陛下…俺達は信仰に篤い人間なんです」
languages.original_text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."

traits.locale_text: 「あ、ああ、そうだね！あのブーツは本当に立派なものだった！それに、持っていっても特に害はなかっただろう？お守りは…きっと何も知らない人がポケットに入れたんだろう。ここらじゃ、お守りなんて必要ないからさ。俺達はみんな、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}を崇拝し、仕事中は大小の変圧器やサーボモーターの{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}に頭を下げているんだ！爺さんが、100年前に技術司祭から教えられたのと同じやり方でね！信じてください、陛下…俺達は信仰に篤い人間なんです」
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: "Oh ja! Die Stiefel waren wirklich prima! Und es hat doch niemandem wehgetan, sie zu nehmen, oder? Und was das Amulett angeht ... das hat wohl jemand eingesteckt, der es nicht besser wusste. Wir brauchen hier keine Amulette. Wir verehren alle den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}, und wenn wir arbeiten, knien wir vor den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeistern{/g} des Großen und des Kleinen Transformators und des Servo-Motors nieder — wie mein Großvater es vor einhundert Jahren von einem Techpriester gelernt hat! Glaubt uns, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} — wir sind gläubige Leute."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja! Die Stiefel waren wirklich prima! Und es hat doch niemandem wehgetan, sie zu nehmen, oder? Wir verehren alle den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g}, und wenn wir arbeiten, knien wir vor den {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeistern{/g} des Großen und des Kleinen Transformators und des Servo-Motors nieder — wie mein Großvater es vor einhundert Jahren von einem Techpriester gelernt hat! Glaubt uns, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} — wir sind gläubige Leute."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: « Ça, c'est bien vrai ! Elles étaient drôlement chouettes, ces bottes ! Ça aurait été dommage de les laisser se perdre. Et pour ce qui est de l'amulette... celui qui l'a prise savait sûrement pas ce qu'il faisait. On a pas besoin de ces cochonneries, nous autres. On vénère tous l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, et quand on travaille, on rend grâce aux {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} des Transformateurs Grands et Petits et du Servomoteur, exactement comme mon grand-père l'a appris au siècle dernier auprès d'un technoprêtre venu prêcher la bonne parole ! Faut nous croire, Votre Seigneurie, on a tous la foi, ici ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."

traits.locale_text: « Ça, c'est bien vrai ! Elles étaient drôlement chouettes, ces bottes ! Ça aurait été dommage de les laisser se perdre. Et pour ce qui est de l'amulette... celui qui l'a prise savait sûrement pas ce qu'il faisait. On a pas besoin de ces cochonneries, nous autres. On vénère tous l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}, et quand on travaille, on rend grâce aux {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} des Transformateurs Grands et Petits et du Servomoteur, exactement comme mon grand-père l'a appris au siècle dernier auprès d'un technoprêtre venu prêcher la bonne parole ! Faut nous croire, Votre Seigneurie, on a tous la foi, ici ! »
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak

languages.text: "Sahiden yahu! Amma güzeldi çizmeleri! Almalarında bir beis yoktur herhâlde, değil mi? Uğurluğa gelince... Cahilin biri almış olsa gerek. Burada uğurluklarla işimiz olmaz bizim. Hepimiz {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} taparız. İş başında ise Büyük ve Küçük Trafoların {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarına{/g}, Hizmotor'un heybetine diz çökeriz. Bir asır evvel kapımızı çalan Tekno Rahip'in dedelerimize öğrettiği neyse bizim için de odur! İnanın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, dini bütün kimseleriz biz."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yeah! Those boots really were fine! And there was no harm in taking them, right? As for the amulet... it must have been pocketed by someone who didn't know any better. We don't need any amulets around here. We all worship the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}, and when we're working we bow down before the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of the Large and Small Transformers and the Servo-Motor — the same way my grandfather was taught a hundred years ago by a Tech-Priest who came calling! Believe us, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} — we are people of faith."

traits.locale_text: "Sahiden yahu! Amma güzeldi çizmeleri! Almalarında bir beis yoktur herhâlde, değil mi? Uğurluğa gelince... Cahilin biri almış olsa gerek. Burada uğurluklarla işimiz olmaz bizim. Hepimiz {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a taparız. İş başında ise Büyük ve Küçük Trafoların {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g}na, Servo Motor'un heybetine diz çökeriz. Bir asır evvel kapımızı çalan Tekno Rahip'in dedelerimize öğrettiği gibi! İnanın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, dini bütün kimseleriz biz."
traits.speaker: RabbleLeaderWeak
